troubleshooting.title: Fixing "Error parsing CSS file" - Caused by a Networking Problem

condition.title: Condition
condition.p: When your custom styles are not applied and in the transformation output (in the results console view) you get errors containing one of: I/O exception, Unknown host, Error parsing.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p:
One of the CSS files contains references to resources from other website that is currently inaccessible. These resources may include:
fonts
images
other CSSs Please note that if you exported one of the built-in publishing templates from the transformation scenario dialog, there might be chances the associated CSSs use Google Fonts.

step.cmd: Double check your proxy settings, ask the system administrator for help.

If the server is still inaccessible from the transformation process, download the remote resources using a web browser, save them in the customization CSS file folder, and refer them directly from your CSS. In case the problem is caused by a remote font, please see Using Local Fonts.
